alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 2:15PM PDT until May 29 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PDT TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the ongoing Wind Advisory, downslope west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory on Sunday, west-northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Owens Valley. * WHEN...For the ongoing Wind Advisory, until 2 AM PDT tonight. For the Wind Advisory on Sunday, from 2 PM to 11 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Lofted dust could reduce visibilities on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest crosswinds are expected across Highway 395 south of Olancha.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
